name: 6th International Conference on Mechanical Engineering and Automation Science
content: 6th International Conference on Mechanical Engineering and Automation Science (ICMEAS 2020) will be held in Moscow, Russia during Oct. 29-31, 2020, which is Hong Kong Society of Mechanical Engineers(HKSME). We warmly welcome prospected authors submit your new research papers to ICMEAS 2020, and share your valuable experiences with all of attaendees.
organizers: Hong Kong Society of Mechanical Engineers(HKSME)
